Weather: is an AI-powered weather prediction system that analyzes data from various sources, including satellites, radar, and ground-based sensors, to provide real-time weather forecasts. It uses machine learning algorithms to identify patterns and trends in the data, and can predict weather conditions with a high degree of accuracy.

WeatherCraft: WeatherCraft is a virtual reality game that allows players to create and control their own weather patterns. Players can use various tools and resources to manipulate the sky, clouds, and other weather elements, and can see the effects of their actions in real-time.

CloudChaser: CloudChaser is a mobile app that allows users to track and monitor cloud formations in real-time. It uses GPS technology to pinpoint the user's location and displays a map of the cloud formations in the area. Users can also set alerts to notify them when specific cloud formations are approaching.

CloudCover: CloudCover is a web-based platform that provides real-time weather data and analysis for farmers and agricultural businesses. It uses satellite imagery and other data sources to monitor cloud cover and precipitation, and can help farmers make informed decisions about irrigation, planting, and other farming practices.

CloudCrystal: CloudCrystal is a cloud-based platform that uses artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to analyze weather data and provide predictive insights. It can be used by businesses and organizations to make informed decisions about operations, supply chain management, and other critical aspects of their operations.
